page.title: 02Playground Games in Fronwen.
page.content: {Fire Ball In Fireball children stand in a circle and throw a ball to each other. In any order if the catcher drops it she has to run around the circle and back to her place before someone dabs the spot where she was standing with the ball. {Fox And Hounds In Fox And Hounds you choose if you want to be a fox or a hound. The hounds give the foxes time to run away then chase after them until they are all caught. {Ghost Train In Ghost Train the last one to run from a point in the yard to the wall is on it. Everybody else returns to the start. A name is shouted and the named person has to run to the wall without being caught. The caught become catchers until all are caught.
